column2: nba_plot_2020_p <- ggplot(nba_2020, aes(x = "Average Points per Game", y = PTS)) + geom_boxplot() + labs(title = "NBA Players 2020", x = NULL, y = "Points") + theme_minimal() + ylim(0, 35) + plot_layout(ncol = 4, widths = c(1.25, 1.5)) + theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 10), axis.title.y = element_text(size = 8))
